alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 2:29PM EDT until May 16 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DELAWARE COUNTY... At 228 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bovina Center, or 7 miles east of Delhi, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Roxbury, Kortright, Andes, Stamford, Hobart, Bovina Center, East Delhi and New Kingston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
